TEXT.S: Bucky Bockhorn nalecuhan i Campbell Hill, Illinois, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Bucky Bockhorn i 1958 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 3 ku uwac atu silsil 17, namapili' tu nu Cincinnati Royals putiput. 7 bulad 8 demiad, 1933 a mihca, Bucky Bockhorn, miunduay.
